mapper.insert: insert into stat_hotproduct (YYYYMMDD, SHOPTYPEID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPENAME, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, SELLOPER, PURCHASEOPER, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4) values (#{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update stat_hotproduct set SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLOPER = #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASEOPER = #{purchaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select YYYYMMDD, SHOPTYPEID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPENAME, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, SELLOPER, PURCHASEOPER, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from stat_hotproduct
